name: Fight Club (Scott_DevYT)
description:
A 3D sequel to Ragdoll boxing where your back in the ring but the rules have changed, there are no rings and there are no rules(mostly).

Visit the multiple locations and come out victorious in all.

**This game is meant to be played with another player/couch play and works well with

any controller**

If you have any suggestions or complaints, leave them down in the comments.
